languages.text: "Не смей в присутствии Вольного Торговца хулить законного губернатора и тем оправдывать бунтовщиков".
"Do not dare badmouth your lawful governor, let alone justify the rebellion, in the presence of a Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "Не смей в присутствии Вольного Торговца хулить законного губернатора и тем оправдывать бунтовщиков".

traits.locale_text: "Don't you dare badmouth your lawful governor, let alone justify the rebellion, in the presence of a Rogue Trader."
"Don't you dare badmouth your lawful governor, let alone justify the rebellion, in the presence of a Rogue Trader."
"Don't you dare badmouth your lawful governor, let alone justify the rebellion, in the presence of a Rogue Trader."
"Don't you dare badmouth your lawful governor, let alone justify the rebellion, in the presence of a Rogue Trader."
"Do not dare badmouth your lawful governor, let alone justify the rebellion, in the presence of a Rogue Trader."
"Do not dare badmouth your lawful governor, let alone justify the rebellion, in the presence of a Rogue Trader."

languages.text: "Wagt es ja nicht, in Gegenwart {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} schlecht über Euren rechtmäßigen Gouverneur zu sprechen, geschweige denn die Rebellion zu rechtfertigen."
languages.original_text: "Do not dare badmouth your lawful governor, let alone justify the rebellion, in the presence of a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Wagt es ja nicht, in Gegenwart {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} schlecht über Euren rechtmäßigen Gouverneur zu sprechen, geschweige denn die Rebellion zu rechtfertigen."

languages.text: « Je vous interdis de dénigrer votre gouverneur légitime, et encore moins de justifier la révolte, en présence d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "Do not dare badmouth your lawful governor, let alone justify the rebellion, in the presence of a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous interdis de dénigrer votre gouverneur légitime, et encore moins de justifier la révolte, en présence d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: “别再行商浪人面前说当局总督的坏话，更不要替叛乱行为辩解。”
languages.original_text: "Do not dare badmouth your lawful governor, let alone justify the rebellion, in the presence of a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “别再行商浪人面前说当局总督的坏话，更不要替叛乱行为辩解。”

languages.text: 「自由開拓者の前で、総督を中傷し、ましてや反乱を正当化するなど、ありえないぞ」
languages.original_text: "Do not dare badmouth your lawful governor, let alone justify the rebellion, in the presence of a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダーの前で、総督を中傷し、ましてや反乱を正当化するなど、ありえないぞ」

languages.text: «No se atreva a hablar mal de su legítimo gobernador, y mucho menos a justificar la rebelión, en presencia de un Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "Do not dare badmouth your lawful governor, let alone justify the rebellion, in the presence of a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «No se atreva a hablar mal de su legítimo gobernador, y mucho menos a justificar la rebelión, en presencia de un Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: "Bir Hür Tacir'in huzurunda, isyanı haklı çıkarmak şöyle dursun, meşru valini kötülemeye cüret edeyim deme."
languages.original_text: "Do not dare badmouth your lawful governor, let alone justify the rebellion, in the presence of a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Bir Hür Tacir'in huzurunda, isyanı haklı çıkarmak şöyle dursun, meşru valini kötülemeye cüret edeyim deme."
